channel.title: Help with char files
channel.description:
ok when some1 sings in they get this in there char file when they start [code] [ACCOUNT] character-username = Dds3030 character-password = 2336c836a2607f135727dfa29abd1814
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2861 character-posy = 3591 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-special = 100 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 93 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 0 character-q2 = 0 character-q3 = 0 character-q4 = 0 character-q5 = 0 character-q6 = 0 character-q7 = 0 character-q8 = 0 character-q9 = 0 character-q10 = 0 character-q11 = 0 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 2 character-skill = 2 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 1291 1 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 1 character-look = 2 10 character-look = 3 18 character-look = 4 26 character-look = 5 33 character-look = 6 36 character-look = 7 42 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 0 character-look = 13 0 character-look = 14 0 character-look = 15 0 character-look = 16 0 character-look = 17 0 character-look = 18 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 37 30000 character-skill = 3 12 1755 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] character-item = 1 1172 1 character-item = 2 842 1 character-item = 3 883 100 character-item = 4 381 100 character-item = 5 996 10000
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF] [/code] i want it to have this when they first log in so all quests are done when they sign in can u help??? this is what i want there char file to start like
[code] [ACCOUNT] character-username = Dds3030 character-password = 2336c836a2607f135727dfa29abd1814
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2861 character-posy = 3591 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-special = 100 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 93 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 2 character-skill = 2 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 1 character-look = 2 10 character-look = 3 18 character-look = 4 26 character-look = 5 33 character-look = 6 36 character-look = 7 42 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 0 character-look = 13 0 character-look = 14 0 character-look = 15 0 character-look = 16 0 character-look = 17 0 character-look = 18 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 1 0 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0

any help?

item.title: Help with char files
item.dc:creator: @chadrocks13 chadrocks13
item.description:
@chadrocks13 wrote:

go into player.java and this is what is should look like atm

public int q1 = 0;
public int q2 = 0;
public int q3 = 0;
public int q4 = 0;
public int q5 = 0;
public int q6 = 0;
public int q7 = 0;
public int q8 = 0;
public int q9 = 0;
public int q10 = 0;
public int q11 = 0;

to get there find public int q1 and it would take you there and what u want to do after u find is paste this in there

public int q1 = 15;
public int q2 = 15;
public int q3 = 15;
public int q4 = 15;
public int q5 = 15;
public int q6 = 15;
public int q7 = 15;
public int q8 = 15;
public int q9 = 15;
public int q10 = 15;
public int q11 = 15;

and you should be done after that compile and run and ure done to go man

chadrocks13

Read full topic

item.title: Help with char files
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change the quest integers to 15 in the player class.

Read full topic
